snippet: Is it really a fossil? Maybe even a dinosaur egg? Experts at the American Museum of Natural History will let the public find out just what booty they’ve found on Identification Day.
abstract: Annual Identification Day at the American Museum of Natural History invites public to bring in an article of unknown origin, such as fossils, rocks, bones or butterflies, and have it explained by experts.
lead_paragraph: Is it really a fossil? Maybe even a dinosaur egg? Experts at the American Museum of Natural History will let the public find out just what booty they’ve found on Identification Day.

headline.seo: American Museum of Natural History Has Identification Day
headline.main: Close, if Not Really Antiques and Not a Road Show
headline.print_headline: Close, if Not Really Antiques and Not a Road Show
